Karen wrote:
> On an only-peripherally-related note: anybody got magic CSS or
> something that can make form links like that look like regular links?

I tend to use:

<a href="confirmation_page_with_submit_button" onclick="return 
function_returns_false_if_successfully_does_a_POST_and_true_otherwise()">Clicky!</a>

Naming convention not shown drawn to scale!
